Package uk.ac.shef.dcs.oak.jate.core.feature

Class Summary
AbstractFeature Representation of a term recognition feature built on an instance of GlobalIndex
AbstractFeatureBuilder Feature builder that builds a feature from a GlobalIndex
FeatureBuilderCorpusTermFrequency A specific type of feature builder that builds an instance of FeatureCorpusTermFrequency from a GlobalIndex.
FeatureBuilderCorpusTermFrequencyMultiThread Serves the same goal as FeatureCorpusTermFrequency, but uses multi-thread in counting term frequencies in corpus.
FeatureBuilderDocumentTermFrequency A specific type of feature builder that builds an instance of FeatureDocumentTermFrequency from a GlobalIndex.
FeatureBuilderDocumentTermFrequencyMultiThread serves the same goal as FeatureBuilderDocumentTermFrequency but uses multi-thread in counting.
FeatureBuilderRefCorpusTermFrequency A specific type of feature builder that builds an instance of FeatureRefCorpusTermFrequency.
FeatureBuilderTermNest A specific type of feature builder that builds an instance of FeatureTermNest from a GlobalIndex.
FeatureBuilderTermNestMultiThread Serves the same goal as FeatureBuilderTermNest.
FeatureCorpusTermFrequency A feature store that contains information of term distributions over a corpus.
FeatureDocumentTermFrequency A feature store that contains information of term distributions in each document.
FeatureRefCorpusTermFrequency A feature store that contains information of term distributions over a reference corpus.
FeatureTermNest A feature store that contains information of nested terms.
